name: Trust in Me
description:
A game about trust, friendship, and learning to be better. You play as Zel during a New Years festival. She's somewhat of a loner to her village. Learn about her story by helping her through some tough times.

Controls

  • I recommend you play in full screen. :)
  • WASD to move
  • SPACE to interact
  • P (press, tap, or hold) to jump/fly
  • CLICK to interact with buttons

Info

Hey all! This is a small game I made for the Emotion & Feelings Jam with the theme "friendship." I wanted to take this time to explore my weird feelings with trusting my friends and telling them my problems with anxiety and depression. I'm not a writer and I'm still trying to process my feelings, so this isn't the best narrative ever. I had fun regardless! I'd like to learn and make more of these games. I hope you enjoy. <3

Feel free to notify me of any bugs and I'll fix them up when I can.

Fun Features (these are actually bugs haha)

  • NPCs like to jerk around after you talk to them. They'll still be in the same place, so don't worry.
  • You can get TWO songs playing at the same time if you've reached the end and restart. Just refresh, the game doesn't save any data anyway, no problemo :D
